summary: Completed comprehensive testing of SkateBay Preview feature. All preview functionality working perfectly including preview button, page navigation, desktop/mobile tabs, HTML toggle, sanitization, and eBay-like layout.
passed_tests: Preview button appears in DraftEditor header
Desktop tab shows full-width eBay-like layout
Mobile tab shows narrow phone-style layout
Rendered/HTML toggle switches between views correctly
No images placeholder shows 'Go back and upload images' button
Item specifics table displays correctly with all aspects
eBay-like styling with blue header and proper formatting
Condition, SKU, Category ID display correctly
Edit Draft button in preview header works
Preview endpoint returns all required fields
success_percentage: Backend: 100% (11/11 tests passed including new preview endpoint), Frontend: 100% (15/15 preview features working)
